## ssmlify() function

Ensures the speech is properly wrapped by <speak> tags. The method is innocuous if they already exist

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ssmlify(str: string, clean?: boolean): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | String to surround with <speak> tags |
|  clean | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

String surrounded by <speak> tags
